content:
As an AI language model, I do not have the ability to predict the future or specific events. However, Norway has consistently been one of the strongest performers in winter sports, and there is no reason to believe that they won't continue to be a major force in the years to come.

Norway has a long-standing tradition of prioritizing winter sports and providing support for their athletes, which has contributed to their continued success. Additionally, they have a talented pool of athletes and coaches who are dedicated to performing at the highest level.

That being said, many other countries have made significant improvements in winter sports in recent years, and the competition at the Winter Olympics is always fierce. While Norway will certainly be a strong contender in future Games, they will undoubtedly face stiff competition from a number of other nations looking to claim their place on the podium.
